content: {"name": "Young Scholars Charter School", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.phila.gov/food/?fbclid=IwAR1KFfmGkseNeQsSAKcOzhJXx400E4xtzNwZA10AHVSclYi7kr7dPSNDBac&address=900%20N%20Marshall%20St", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "900 N Marshall St", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19123", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.96769706633002, "longitude": -75.14813815948935}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 895-3470", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
